metadata.title: CVE-2021-20299 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: A flaw was found in OpenEXR's Multipart input file functionality. A craftedmulti-part input file with no actual parts can trigger a NULL pointerdereference. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to systemavailability.

criterions.comment: openexr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
